alert.note: Alert for Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:31AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lee, southeastern St. Francis, northeastern Phillips and Tunica Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 931 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Brickeys, or 9 miles east of Marianna, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St Francis National Park, Helena-West Helena, Tunica, Rondo, Dubbs, Brickeys, North Tunica, Dundee, Robinsonville, Little Texas, Lagrange, Jeffersonville, Cody, Clack, Gerlach Mill, Kokomo, Haleside, Commerce, Austin and Mud Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
